mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME (RESUME_ID, USER_NAME, RESUME_TITLE, EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, TOWN_NAME, CITY_NAME, CITY_NAME, JOB_NAME, WORK_FORM, PERIOD_NAME, DAY_NAME, PARTTIME_NAME, SALARY, SALARY_FORM, SKILL, INTRO, RESUME_DATE_CREATED) VALUES (0, #{userName}, #{resumeTitle}, #{education}, #{experience}, #{townName}, #{cityName}, #{jobName}, #{workForm}, #{periodName}, #{dayName}, #{dayName}, #{parttimeName}, #{salary}, #{salaryForm}, #{skill}, #{intro}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUME WHERE RESUME_ID = #{resumeId} AND USER_NAME = #{userName}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESUME WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName} AND RESUME_ID = #{resumeId}
